freemarkerTextToGlueTransformer.freemarkerTemplate: <#list rows as row> <#assign id>${row["id"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign source>${row["source"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign text>${row["text"]?trim}</#assign> create custom-table-row drug_guideline "${id}" custom-table-row drug_guideline "${id}" set field source "${source}" set field text "${text}" exit </#list>
